articles.author: Anthony Spadafora
articles.title: Credit scores of millions of Americans have been exposed online - Techradar
articles.description: Lender used Experian's API to allow unauthenticated users to check credit scores
articles.content:
The credit scores of millions of Americans were left exposed online when a lender misused an API belonging to the credit reporting agency Experian.
As first reported by Krebs on Security, independen… [+2273 chars]

articles.author: hermes
articles.title: Michael Collins, the 'forgotten' astronaut of Apollo 11, dies at 90 - The Straits Times
articles.description: WASHINGTON • American astronaut Michael Collins, who as pilot of the Apollo 11 command module stayed behind on July 20, 1969, while Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin travelled to the lunar surface to become the first humans to walk on the Moon, has died at age 9…
